title: Pls dont publish my name re service dogs - Bruns Cty. Question #2 -What is definition of service dog? Any official training/certification? What prevents someone putting a Service blanket on their personal dog? Must a service dog service a handicapped person after training/certification- or can dog be used as personal dog for anon-handicapped person?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/03/service-dog-can-used-non-handicapped-people/
